title: Rhodes Five-Star Adults-Only Greek Island Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner and Guaranteed Sea View Upgrades
description:
Be overcome by romance at Lindos Grand Resort & Spa, a five-star adults-only sanctuary on the dreamy Greek Island of Rhodes boasting spellbinding views over the Mediterranean Sea. Tucked into the hillside above the serene bay of Vlycha, just a short jaunt away from the picturesque village of Lindos, this sophisticated retreat offers modern comforts surrounded by contemporary style. Enjoy sweeping sea views, spend afternoons lounging by the beachfront pool or unwind at the wellness centre. Dine across an array of internationally-inspired restaurants, like Takara Asian Restaurant or Agistri Greek Fish Restaurant, with rotating menus of traditional recipes.

Famed for its iridescent waters, pebble shores and awe-inspiring ruins - there is no shortage of ways to spend your days. Easily accessible trails take you to the Paralia Vilcha coastline - perfect for bathing in the glittering sea. Ancient ruins and natural hot springs are just a short drive away.
